1.20.19  7:02 am   You know what I never got? Why are there only 5 note lines in the staff when inevitably you'll be having some notes below the five lines (in thos small imaginary lines below) and sometimes you'll even have notes above the five lines. Why didn't they make it 7 lines so you get 2 more lines and 2 more spaces for a total of 4 more notes before you have to go above or below the lines? Hope you're following what my question is
1.20.19  6:20 am   why is bad music sometimes good, and why is good music sometimes bad?

Is there a "hidden meaning" in these songs or is it all like just stuff that works?

1.20.19  1:52 am   1.19.19  12:21 pm   Hey, I'm a professional physicist, and just so you know, this is a trap. Science actually becomes more useless the more fundamental you get, so a TOE would actually be the ultimate useless thing. There are many many things (in fact, the overwhelming majority of things in this world) that a TOE would not actually explain because no one outside of string theorists actually do science from first principles (deriving everything from quantum mechanics, etc). People just try to come up with models that fit their data. Please ask me if you need me to elaborate on any of this.

1.20.19  1:20 am   Hi checking in. Wondering if you are doing okay. We don't really know a lot about you.  

     If you need something? How you spend your day?

      I worry about people who live online but I guess we all do.

      I hope you never feel too alone or forced into this life.
